specification.title: Google Technical Support Appointment - Lead Generation Implementation Requirements

required_attendees: Person with admin access to modify website source code
Person with administrative access to Google Ads account
Person with administrative access to Analytics account
pre_call_preparation: Back up website before the call
Have Google Meet ready for screen sharing
All attendees must accept calendar invite

appointment_parameters.cancellation_policy: Appointment cancelled if all attendees decline or don't respond within 24 hours

technical_setup.implementation_scope: Installation of tracking codes and campaign setup
